summary:
Niagara Falls is a group of three waterfalls on the border of Canada and the United States. The largest is Horseshoe Falls, which is on the Canada-US border. The other two waterfalls are American Falls and Bridal Veil Falls, located in the US.

The falls are formed by the Niagara River, which flows from Lake Erie to Lake Ontario. They have the highest flow rate of any waterfall in North America with a drop of more than 50 meters. Niagara Falls is known for its beauty and is a source of hydroelectric power.
title: Niagara Falls
